We Care for Your Health Every Moment: Dufata neza Ubuzima Bwawe Buri Munota Wose
Empowering Communities Through the Fusio: Guhesha Ubumenyi Komunote Mu Kuganisha Umubavu wa Gakondo ku Migenzo y’Ubu Muganga w'Ubuzima.
Murakoze gutaga randevu yanyu mwihange m: Murakoze Gukora Randevu. Mwihangane Umuganga Azabasubiza Ku E-mail Yanyu.
Local healer cultivating and treating wi: Umuganga w'umwimerere uvura kandi ahinga imiti kavukire
MUSSA is a local healer in Rwanda, dedic: MUSSA ni umuganga w'umwimerere mu Rwanda, wiyemeje gufasha imiryango ihura n'indwara zitandukanye binyuze mu gukoresha imiti kavukire izwi nka UMUTI. Ntavura gusa indwara, ahubwo ahinga n'ibimera bikenewe mu gukora iyo miti kavukire. Kandi, MUSSA akora ubushakashatsi ku ndwara zandura n'uko zavurwa akoresheje imiti y'ubuvuzi bwa gakondo, atanga ubumenyi ku ikoreshwa ry'iyo miti mu buryo bwiza.
Mussa provides essential medical service: Mussa atanga serivisi z'ubuvuzi bw'ibanze akoresheje uruvange rw'imiti gakondo y'u Rwanda, yizewe neza kubaha ubuvuzi bwuzuye abakeneye.
Awareness of Missing Medicine service en: Serivisi yo gukumira kubura imiti yizeza kubona imiti y'ibanze binyuze mu gukoresha imiti gakondo y'u Rwanda itandukanye.
Provides essential medicine knowledge to: Itanga ubumenyi bw'ibanze ku miti ku nzobere mu buzima, ikoresheje imiti gakondo y'u Rwanda itandukanye mu gusubiza neza ibyifuzo by'abakenera ubuvuzi.
Promoting cooperatives to grow medicinal: Guteza imbere amakoperative yo guhinga imiti ni serivisi ya Mussa yo gushoboza abatanga serivisi z'ubuzima gukoresha imiti gakondo y'u Rwanda itandukanye, biteza imbere umuryango utekanye.
Through the development of the medical i: Binyuze mu iterambere ry'urwego rw'ubuvuzi, gushyiraho imirimo biratezwa imbere, bitanga amahirwe yo kubona akazi no kongera ubukungu.
Motivation in plant conservation drives: Gushishikariza kubungabunga imiti bitera imbaraga mu kurinda no kubungabunga amoko atandukanye y'ibimera, bikemeza uburambe bwabyo ku bazaza mu gihe kiri imbere.
United Nations Educational, Scientific a: Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye rishinzwe Uburezi, Ubumenyi n’Umuco
Though medicinal plants benefits are kno: Nubwo ibyiza by'imiti gakondo bizwi n'Abanyarwanda bose, ikoreshwa cyane cyane mu byaro kandi bigoye kuyikoresha mu mijyi kubera impamvu nyinshi.
The National Industrial Research and Dev: Ikigo cy'Igihugu cy'Ubushakashatsi no Guhanga Ibishya mu Nganda (NIRDA).
